document.full_text: britain's healthcare cost watchdog nice has recommended against using bristol-myers squibb's rheumatoid arthritis drug orencia on the state health service as a second-line treatment.
document.title: uk's cost agency rebuffs bristol arthritis drug
lines_and_colors: britain's healthcare cost watchdog nice has recommended against using bristol-myers squibb's rheumatoid arthritis drug orencia on the state health service as a second-line treatment.
